post:
Our infamous £29 a month dedicated server in London is back for Black Friday. We also have _brand new Intel E Series servers_ in London, UK , Amsterdam, NL & Frankfurt, DE with **a limited number of additional discounts for LES visitors!**

<br />
##What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (640Gbps Total) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP's.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent, congestion free connectivity.
-LINX and LONAP partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 datacenters.
-Tier 3 Datacentres in London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

<br />
##So where are the offers?
<br />
Current offers can be seen at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale) , subject to availability. If it’s not listed its gone! **"LES-TALK-2019BF”** gives an additional £5 recurring discount for the first 10 orders on our E-1, E-2 & E-3 Configurations!

Some of the most popular configurations can be found below.
<br />
###E-1 Promo
E-2276G (6 Cores, 12 Threads, 3.8 GHz & 4.9 Ghz Turbo),
16 GB DDR4 ECC RAM, 
512GB NVMe, 
50 TB @ 2.5Gbps
£50 per month with "LES-TALK-2019BF”, £55 per month without.
Available in Amsterdam & Frankfurt.

###E-2 Promo
E-2288G (8 Cores, 16 Threads, 3.7 GHz & 5.0 Ghz Turbo),
16 GB DDR4 ECC RAM, 
1TB NVMe, 
50 TB @ 2.5Gbps
£74 per month with "LES-TALK-2019BF”, £79 per month without.
Available in Amsterdam & Frankfurt.

###E-3 Promo
E-2146G (6 Cores, 12 Threads, 3.5 GHz & 4.5 Ghz Turbo)
16 GB DDR4 ECC RAM,
240GB SSD,
50 TB @ 2.5 Gbps,
£50 per month with "LES-TALK-2019BF”, £55 per month without.
Available in London, UK.
<br />

###Preset i3 1TB
I3-3240 (2 Cores, 4 Threads, 3.40 GHz)
4GB DDR3 RAM
1x 1TB HDD
30 TB @ 1 Gbps,
£29 per month in London, UK.

###Preset 1230v2 1TB
E3-1230v2 (4 Cores, 8 Threads, 3.3 Ghz & 3.7 Ghz Turbo)
8GB DDR3 ECC RAM,
2 x 1TB HDD,
Software RAID,
30TB @ 1 Gbps,
£35 per month in London, UK.

###Preset 1230v2 500GB
E3-1230v2 (4 Cores, 8 Threads, 3.3 Ghz & 3.7 Ghz Turbo)
16GB DDR3 ECC RAM,
2 x 500GB HDD,
Hardware RAID,
30TB @ 1 Gbps,
£35 per month in London, UK.

<br />
##FAQ’s:

#####Can these servers be customised?
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for our Xeon E- systems. If you seek a different configuration please contact us.

#####Can I check your network?
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at [https://as62240.net/](https://as62240.net/). Alternatively you can use the following test IP’s:
185.42.223.63 - London, UK
194.127.172.33 - Amsterdam, NL
91.199.118.14 - Frankfurt, DE

#####How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days.
Custom configurations may take longer and E series orders in London are due within 7 working days due to the expected order levels.

#####Do you offer IPv6?
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

#####Can you accommodate x, y or z?
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

<br />
##Any questions or queries? 
Contact our team today at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/).
<br />

<small>All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions). Cancellation notice period applies.</small>
